TopicTitle: Fastest Plane under 1.000m. [WE HAVE REACHED MACH 5!, Tidus Klein at 1,714 m/s]

Articles.Content:
So here is my best entry it did

some how i managed to land after loosing the but of my plain, I dont know what caused it to fall off

It got max speed of 737.3M/s (Aka Mach 2.175) happens at 44 second mark

A good way to do air intakes

well, that's not "cheating", but somehow it is!, i'll add you in the FAR list, really fast ^^

well, that's not "cheating", but somehow it is!, i'll add you in the FAR list, really fast ^^

ME so called "Cheating" never

bending every rule going is much more like me
so far i can get to 399.8M/s with just stock parts and that was last second when 'Running dry'
awesome kerbal face on that screeny

hahaha poor Hudfred

I dont think you can glide with that plane back to the runway

defiantly not the 90KM and no safety to save weight so he crashed and died

and im rely looking forwards to see what others do for this challenge as i know there are so many different ways to make a very fast craft than im doing
I've reached mach 1.9, but cant turn back and land

Somewhere i messed up the above formula. I did a graph with some nice website, just FYI

Max speed seems to be way lower than i originally calculated (if i didnt mess up THIS time )

http://imgur.com/trtCref

NikkyD how very .22 of you to use !SCIENCE! to over come the Challenge

ps still not beat old speed

Quite honestly, the only challenge for me is the ******** builder and the vanilla parts. The thing needs almost no wings, but without wings i dont have any parts to attack the engines to. Yeah sure, build one completely out of structs... because of the extreme overweight of the engines you need lots of parts behind the engines... HOW ? ofc, build a tail out of 20 structs... the "tail" part of the aerodynamics section would be perfect, size, shape and lenght. However its weight of 400 kg is pure nonsense. I can build the same mountpoint only with structs and they weigh NOTHING. Its complete BS and pisses me off every challenge.

In addition, flying a vanilla plane without FAR and with keyboard is... So i stick to the theoretical department until they truly fix all the issues... which will be in a year or so

Edit:

365 m/s with approx 1.5 t per engine is the topspeed of my best craft yet, but the route it should fly is almost impossible to achieve with keyboard + vanilla (and again, i dont want to use FAR)

Edited January 15, 2014 by NikkyD

Hey fluffysnowcap, check this plane out

I couldnt land because i had Angle of attack assist enabled in FAR, but it's doable

highest speed under 1000m was 847.9 m/s. Not giving a good look at the plane is intentional as a second entry, I'll post them later on.

http://i.imgur.com/PfF3bPI.jpg

Now that people have caught on, here are the additional shots for this exact same plane and same run, so no I wasn't bluffing it:
doesn't explain why your maximum altitude was over 3K. in your screenshot at 989m your plane is descending at a rate of ~10 m/s. Not that I don't believe your entry, just pointing out the gaps.
yeeeeeeah, and it's suposed to be landed

doesn't explain why your maximum altitude was over 3K. in your screenshot at 989m your plane is descending at a rate of ~10 m/s. Not that I don't believe your entry, just pointing out the gaps.

I went to 3000 after these to land. I was going down because I went slightly above 1000 because it is difficult to control when you're shaking so hard from going fast in dense air.

I went to 3000 after these to land. I was going down because I went slightly above 1000 because it is difficult to control when you're shaking so hard from going fast in dense air.

i know what you mean hence why i tweaked a mechjeb to fly it for me as i found it imposable to control over 500M/s and yours douse look liget

and m1sz 645.2M/s is a nice speed

I've been trying to make a smaller and lighter plane, but it gets crazy over 400m/s..., biger designs are also bad... so much drag!

it's not easy at all

I managed to go at 330m/s with stock parts and no FAR. It's getting very difficult to handle at these speeds, but maybe with more jets, we can go faster.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
beautiful and small plane!, added to the no far list

Hey, inspired by this challenge i tried to build something everybody can fly in low atmosphere and still is cool and fast. I named it LUFTMEISTER Eins (AIRMASTER one, in english).

I made some Test flights and recorded a little bit, having so much fun still dont know how fast it really can go if you just try hard. I did 605 m/s under 1000 m, a little above 1000 m it got some faster. I hope you enjoy the video and also the craft.

I used B9 and FAR and did all flying without RCS, S.A.S. or some other mods to help and im not the best pilot.

LUFTMEISTER Eins

I didn't land. So maybe someone wants to give it a try. If you like the video or not, feel free to comment

Feel free to download the craft file and to do whatever you want. If you reuse it for posts or vids it would be cool if you can use the original name LUFTMEISTER.

LUFTMEISTER-Eins.craft
How did you manged to put enough fuel in that craft to fly for so long
overpowered airplane there, please!, record the plane going to full speed under 1000m and ill add you to the leaderboard

How did you manged to put enough fuel in that craft to fly for so long

It uses one Mk 1 2 m Fuel Tank (380LF). And it shows me 0.5 fuel consumption during full speed under 1000m, so i think its enough to visit all the places on Kerbin, or what do you mean?. My goal was more to build something everybody can use and modify. There is enogh fuel, air and space for more engines or other gimmicks. I will soon record a video for the leaderboard
just that some of the designs i toyed around with of that size ran out of fuel
